plot outline: Jew Town is a small colony in Kochi where Jennifer and Sachidanandan lives. Jennifer and Sachidanandan deeply love each other from childhood , but both bear the responsibilities of their families now. Jenni must sacrifice her love for Sachi and marry an Israelian soldier to fulfill her family's wishes. Will she be able to sacrifice her love ? Will they be able to forget each other ? Watch and see...
title: Gramaphone
plot: Jennifer is the only hope of her family to reach Israel. But for her family she should sacrifice her own love and friendship.

Jew Town is a small colony in Kochi where Jennifer and Sachidanandan lives. Jennifer and Sachidanandan deeply love each other from childhood , but both bear the responsibilities of their families now. Jenni must sacrifice her love for Sachi and marry an Israelian soldier to fulfill her family's wishes. Will she be able to sacrifice her love ? Will they be able to forget each other ? Watch and see...::Mohammed Afrin
